Key Match Events: South Africa win by six wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Markram happy with South Africa’s efforts
Hasaranga says it was a ‘130-140 run wicket'
Nortje revels in great result for the Proteas
Others: South Africa go top of Group D
Theekshana thinks he has trapped Klaasen LBW, and Sri Lanka take a review. The ball-tracking shows the ball was pitching outside leg, and Sri Lanka lose their review.
